name: NSBatchUpdateRequestResultType
desc: Result types for a batch-update request.

items.name: case statusOnlyResultType
items.desc: A value that indicates the return type is a Boolean value representing whether the batch-update request succeeds.

items.name: case updatedObjectIDsResultType
items.desc: A value that indicates the return type is an array of object IDs that corresponds to the updated rows.

items.name: case updatedObjectsCountResultType
items.desc: A value that indicates the return type is the number of updated rows.
